instruction: As a corporate board member, identify three factors that can help strengthen the board in response to the current global challenges.
output: As a corporate board member, I believe that introducing more climate-related experience, increasing the number of women on the board, and appointing younger directors are three key factors that can help strengthen corporate boards in navigating the economic and social disruptions we are currently facing. By diversifying the skillset of the board and its members, we can better address a range of pressing global issues, including climate change, changes in regulation, and workforce relations. These factors will be crucial to consider as we move forward into 2023 and beyond.
